Title: The hearts of people of all nationalities turn towards the Party
Designer: Yao Youxin (姚有信)Jin Guangyu (金光瑜)Wang Dawen (汪大文)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: The house on Huangpi Road in Shanghai, where the first National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party was opened secretly on 23 July 1921.
Theme: The Founding of the Chinese Communist Party (1921)Shanghai, Poster City
Tags: National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party
